base_case.description: Most likely economic trajectory based on current indicators
key_assumptions: GDP growth moderates to trend of 2.0%
Unemployment stabilizes near natural rate of 5.0%
Inflation converges to target of 2.0%
Policy remains data-dependent with gradual normalization

bear_case.description: Economic stress scenario with potential recession
key_assumptions: Recession probability 22% materializes
Employment deteriorates significantly
Policy becomes accommodative to support growth
Financial conditions tighten substantially

bull_case.description: Economic acceleration scenario with above-trend growth
key_assumptions: Productivity gains accelerate growth potential
Employment remains robust with wage growth
Inflation remains contained despite strong growth
Policy tightening more gradual than feared

key_themes: Scenario-based analysis shows significant uncertainty around central forecasts
Leading indicators suggest economic momentum building
Policy transmission remains constrained under current conditions
Forward-looking indicators provide early warning signals for policy adjustments
policy_implications: Scenario diversity suggests need for flexible policy approach
Forward indicators provide early signals for policy adjustment timing
Policy effectiveness varies significantly across economic conditions

regime_characteristics.policy_stance: Accommodative monetary policy, fiscal stimulus considered

base_case.description: Current geopolitical risks remain at present levels
key_assumptions: Trade tensions remain elevated but stable
Policy uncertainty continues at current levels
No major new geopolitical events
Trade war intensifies with broader tariffs
Policy uncertainty spikes around major events
Additional geopolitical tensions emerge
Trade agreements reached or tensions cool
Policy clarity reduces uncertainty
Diplomatic solutions to key conflicts

asset_allocation_adjustments.rationale: Based on -0.05pp GDP impact and 0.01pp inflation impact from geopolitical risks

recommended_strategies.rationale: Hedge against currency volatility from geopolitical instability

key_positioning_themes: Limited safe haven options increase portfolio vulnerability
portfolio_positioning_summary.risk_budget_allocation: Conservative - limit geopolitical risk exposure to 10-15% of portfolio
